description: The file defines the MenuParser class which provides static methods for parsing and cleaning raw OCR menu text to extract a list of distinct dish names. It includes functions for cleaning lines, removing prices, bullets, and descriptors, and for filtering invalid or short tokens.

classes.name: MenuParser
classes.description: A utility class offering static methods to parse, clean, and extract dish names from OCR output text.

methods.name: parseDishNames
methods.description: Main public method that takes raw OCR text as input and returns a list of cleaned, unique dish names based on specified filtering rules.

methods.name: _cleanLine
methods.description: Helper method to remove numbering, bullets, and section headers from a line.

methods.name: _finalizeDish
methods.description: Helper method to remove prices, weights, descriptors, and do minor casing normalization on a string representing a dish.
